chain.description: Sequential process where tasks are broken into smaller steps.
chain.best_practice: Use explicit gates between steps to validate output.

parallelization.best_practice: Use a central aggregator/synthesizer for final results.

routing.description: Classification and redirection of input to specialized handlers.
routing.best_practice: Minimize routing hops to avoid intent degradation.

evaluator-optimizer.description: Iterative feedback loop between generation and review.
evaluator-optimizer.best_practice: Define clear 'Definition of Done' for the evaluator.

orchestrator-workers.description: Central manager delegating sub-tasks to workers.
orchestrator-workers.best_practice: Ensure workers have minimal, targeted context.
